[Open Status to gain Max EXP (off)]
04000000 009B0018 B940B275
04000000 009B0028 0B150008

04000000 01594EE4 D65F03C0
[Open Skill Window to Gain 99 Skill points (off)]
04000000 01594ED4 2956A109
04000000 01594ED8 4B080128
04000000 01594EDC B9000048
04000000 01594EE0 D65F03C0
04000000 01594EE4 00000000

[Gold never decreases]
04000000 009F5414 D503201F
[Gold increases instead of decrease]
04000000 009F5414 2B010108
[Gold changes like normal]
04000000 009F5310 6B010108

[Unlimited MP (Player & Monster) (on)]
04000000 00359D70 2A0903E1
[Unlimited MP (Player & Monster) (off)]
04000000 00359D70 4B080121

04000000 014E6E44 52800288
